name: Cookin' Colosseum
description:
A game made in one week for the Brackey's Game Jam.

You take the role of a chef, stuck in a kitchen that has been invaded by angry customers. Feed them... and regain control of your kitchen!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aiming

Left Click - Shooting

Space - Dashing

Escape - Unlocking your Cursor

Credits:

Sound Effects/Music

Food Splat Sound Effect: Mike Koenig

Music From:  https://www.FesliyanStudios.com
